titleStmt.title: Articles of impeachment by the Commons assembled in Parliament, in the name of themselves and all the commons in England against Sir Thomas Gardiner, recorder of the citie of London, for severall great crimes and misdemeanours committed by him : as also the votes concerning Generall Major Skipton : with an order for the disposing of the magazine of the counties of England and Wales.
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, Thomas, Sir, 1591-1652.

titleStmt.title: Articles of impeachment by the Commons assembled in Parliament, in the name of themselves and all the commons in England against Sir Thomas Gardiner, recorder of the citie of London, for severall great crimes and misdemeanours committed by him : as also the votes concerning Generall Major Skipton : with an order for the disposing of the magazine of the counties of England and Wales.
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, Thomas, Sir, 1591-1652.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: The votes and order are printed on the verso of the t.p.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
